column4: Hi... is anyone using the solderless touchscreen for the eeepc or wind on 9.04? If so, how did you set it up (awaiting arrival for mine)
i am thinking of doing so, if you bought on ebay there is a model that includes drivers for linux
- Yep, got mine on ebay. Just wondering if its going to be a case of compiling and so on or if Ubuntu has any decent support already...
